thread.title: Marilyn Farkas
thread.title_full: American Freight Furniture & Mattress reviewed by Marilyn Farkas

author: Marilyn Farkas
title: Marilyn Farkas
text:
I was fortunate to walk into your store for the first time and was greeted by Devin Callies, salesman. He helped me to understand the differences in mattresses, helped me with the selection of twin beds and headboards. Additionally, he brought to my attention the floor lamp and two lamps as a package. Delivery was made the same day; they helped to assemble the frames.
I've since told neighbors about American Freight Furniture in Port Orange, FL. They are going to investigate. A big thank you to Devin and the ad I saw in the papers.
